review: Check out "Ruko" streamer first..see review on "CNET" about Chromecast,apple,amazon fire tv,..wish I would have save me allot of Hassell returning. AMAZON WAS REALLY GREAT ON REFUND PROCESS.Chrome cast has a very limited amount of apps available compared to the others. DONT relyon Chromecast feature of mirror Web page it don't work to well ( I'm taking CNETS coment on their review on this) but all of the players are not magic bullets they all have weaknesses.But I still think RUKO IS a more adaptable streamer.I will say if you just need a limited amount of apps Netflix,Amazon Hulu Plus..it should work fine.
author: nancy g

review: After fooling around with hdmi cords from my laptop to tv, I found this and it is Great, I can broadcast from my phone or even my computer excellent video quality and sound. Even bought another as a gift.
